answers.answer: Hello cathy, please visit this site: http://www.diabetesadvocacy.com/assistance.htmClaims that they will assist you in getting a pump for a child. How old is your daughter?Another terrific site: http://www.ipump.org/I believe that you should check out these organizations because they certainly look promising in order for you to get a free pump for your daughter. Let us know!
A very interesting site, lindsaylinn.If you are a teamster driver, contact Tom O'Donnel at the International.

question: i need help with a pump for my daughter we have two children my wife needs to be home with my daughter and Im a truck driver I make about 650.00 a week can i get a free pump
title: diabetes pump
